entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Rain showers beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
